humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions metastases in 3 sentinel lymph nodes (1/1, 1/1, 1/1) in the left axilla. Based on the AJCC staging system, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic adenocarcinoma involving 3 out of 4 sentinel lymph nodes. According to the 8th edition of the AJCC cancer staging manual, N1 means metastasis in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. The sizes of the metastases are not considered in this stage grouping.
